parameters.name: AllocationId
parameters.description: The ID of the EIP that you want to query. You can specify up to 50 EIP IDs. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: AssociatedInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance with which you want to associate the EIP.

parameters.name: AssociatedInstanceType
parameters.description:
The type of the instance that is associated with the EIP. Valid values:

*   **EnsInstance**: ENS instance in a VPC
*   **SlbInstance**: SLB instance

parameters.name: EipAddress
parameters.description: The EIP that you want to query. You can specify up to 50 EIPs. Separate multiple EIPs with commas (,).

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Edge Node Service (ENS) node.

parameters.name: EnsRegionIds
parameters.description: The IDs of edge nodes. You can specify 1 to 100 IDs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Standby
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the EIP is a secondary EIP. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**
